name: NFT Creator
description: From music to real estate, create nft and tokenize anything!

translation.Connect your wallet to get started!: Connect your wallet to get started!
translation.Please confirm the transaction from your: Please confirm the transaction from your wallet and wait...
translation.The simplest, yet most flexible way to c: The simplest, yet most flexible way to create NFTs
translation.Drop your jpeg, png, mp3 audio and mp4 v: Drop your jpeg, png, mp3 audio and mp4 videos up to 10mb
translation.Title: Tile
translation.You, as a content creator, will receive: You, as a content creator, will receive a royalty based on the percentage everytime this NFT is being sold in a marketplace supporting
translation.You can add custom fields to the metadat: You can add custom fields to the metadata of this NFT in case you need to store custom properties e.g. promo_code: 1155 in order to support different
translation.Edit the metadata source code directly: Edit the metadata source code directly
translation.We recommend setting attributes through: We recommend setting attributes through the basic/advanced tabs functionalities but if they fall short you can always edit manually. Notice that modifying this file will change the metadata, but these changes may not be visible by other tabs.
translation.Use an existing NFT smart contract or la: Use an existing NFT smart contract or launch your new one to create your NFTs on
translation.Add custom unique attributes to your NFT: Add custom unique attributes to your NFT to enhance rarity e.g. monster_type: electric as per
